task.title: Create a Program
task.shortdesc: Programs are setup and administered by the designated staff user(s) in a given business area.

taskbody.context: To create a Program from the Program Type detail page:

step.cmd: Navigte to the Programs related list. Click the New button. (The Program Type looks up to the Program Type record and autopopulates.)
Select the Program Entity: Contact or Account. The Entity is required and identifies the participant's record type. Once the record is created, this cannot be changed.
Click Save button to create the Program record.

ul.li: Display Name - the Program's full or formal name that displays on the Program Profile Page.
Discipline - picklist values defined during implementation to support report needs
Start and End Dates - optional dates used to define the lifecycle of the program
Active (chekbox) - when checked, activates the Program; dependent on the existence of at least one requirement
Designation - acronym awarded for successfully completing the program
Image - brand or logo associated with the program
Description - definition or explanation of program

Requirement Field Set - captures API name associated with the requirement object. It determines which fields displays to program participant; default (Default Requirement Field Set) autopopulates on save

Progress Bar (checkbox) - when checked, progress bar displays Program section of Program Profile Page. Percentage of completed requirements is calclated based on the number completed goals over the total number of goals
Candidate and Maintenance Terms - captures the duration (months) that a participant has to complete all of the goals associated with a Program Term
Lifetime Term - identifies programs that have been successfully completed but neither expire nor need to be maintained
Email Address and Phone Number- stores contact information specific to the support and maintenance of the program
